definition[0]: the part of a song that is repeated after each verse
definition[1]: a large group of people who sing together
example[1]: I sing with the university chorus.
definition[2]: a piece of music written to be sung by a large group of people
definition[3]: a group of singers, dancers, or actors who act together in a show but do not have the main parts
example[3]: New voices are needed to join the chorus for the annual festival in October.
definition[4]: if people chorus something, they say it at the same time
